## TryCpConductor.connectAppInterface() method

Connect a web socket to the App API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connectAppInterface(signalHandler?: AppSignalCb): Promise<null>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signalHandler | AppSignalCb | <i>(Optional)</i> A callback function to handle signals. |
